name: Ten con Ten
review: This place came highly recommended by a friend who had just visited Madrid on his honeymoon--and it did not ​. The atmosphere was an intimate setting, yet.... Because, Madrid, in reality, is nothing special. It does not have a great river, and hardly any skyscrapers. No channels, no lakes. Neither glorious ruins,.... We visited this restaurant because it was highly recommended by a friend and it didn't disappoint. We had a great meal and service was outstanding.  We....

name: El Paraguas
address: Calle de Jorge Juan, 16, 28001 Madrid, Spain
review: The restaurant offers an elegant and formal ambience with a great atmosphere and professional and customer service driven professionals in the food.... I would highly discourage anyone from eating at El Paraguas while visiting Madrid, despite the oddly high ratings. Clearly the customers who have reviewed.... Tiene trenta minutos Para conseguir agua...servicio muy mal,  comida nada especial y cara. Buenos noches!! Nunca volver..

name: Street Xo
review: Awesome and amazing. I first came here over 5 years ago when I couldn't get into David Munoz' Diver XO. It was then as is now: amazing. Street is a lot more.... After watching the Netflix show " Somebody feed Phil" that featured Street XO, we had so much exciting anticipation coming to the restaurant finally. This.... Website states the line is available at 7:30PM.We arrived at 7:30PM and there were already 20 people sitting in line. SO you can actually get there at....

name: Goiko Grill
address: Calle Conde de Peñalver, 41, 28006 Madrid, Spain
review: Terrible.  They served raw burgers, not rare, blue.  After taking them back to our hotel and figuring out the quality issue, we returned to fix the error,.... Muy buenas hamburguesas. De las mejores que he comido en estos años. La carne es muy buena, las patatas increíbles (muchos restaurantes las dejan un poco.... Mac and cheese balls were unreal, the burger was great as well however i asked for well done and found the burger to be very pink..

name: InClan Brutal
review: Amazing cocktails and good service!!!!! Also love their decor and fantastic cocktail menu.. This is a place you go for the atmosphere and for fun pictures. It is exactly what you expect. Every part of the restaurant is thought out. From the selfie.... How fun is this place?!? I am so glad I found this place on yelp. We were not hungry when we came in but needed a place to sit before heading to the....

name: Rosi La Loca
review: Rosie La Loca is the result of someone saying "how can make tapas fun, funky, and slightly fairytalish".  They achieved their vision .   There is no moment,.... Super underrated here in Madrid. The first and last place for original Tapas. We accidentally stumbled in on this place and were blown away. Then traveled.... We went here our first night in Madrid after searching quickly for someplace to eat, and it was packed. If you want to eat inside, you have to make a....

name: La Tasqueria
address: Calle Duque de Sesto, 48, 28009 Madrid, Spain
review: This is definitely my favorite restaurant in Madrid, they are wild enough to make anything into best food, and the sauces they make are so creative ! Every.... Like Brad M., my boyfriend and I also decided to make this our last meal in Spain.  After two weeks roaming around this lovely country, we decided to end.... To our surprise we were able to get last-minute reservations to this place on a Friday night for our last dinner in Spain.  We wanted to make sure it was....

name: Cañadío
address: Calle del Conde de Peñalver, 86, 28006 Madrid, Spain
review:
A gem in the non touristic neighborhood!

On my last day during a 3 week vacation to Spain, found this splendid restaurant near my hotel. After a day trip.... Very nice outdoor space friendly staff ask for English menu as no one spoke great English. Fresh anchovies are the best and they say they have the best.... SUMMARY: Eat here. You won't regret it. Downstairs tapas and drinks. Upstairs - upscale dining. Prepare to pay appropriately. 

FOOD: 5 stars - MUST EATS -....

name: Tandoori Station
address: Calle de José Ortega y Gasset, 89- 91, 28006 Madrid, Spain
review: Lets start with - you need reservation. If u do not have one, you will need to wait till 11:30 or so to get in. This place serves individulized Indian food,.... Very good Indian food and service  in a lovely little restaurant.  Pretty expensive which is factored in my rating. We enjoyed our chicken tikka masala and.... Great food and service. As spicy as you want it. Always worth a visit if you can get a reservation..

name: La Gastro
review:
Highly recommend for tapas and drinks!!

We found La Gastro on yelp since we were at a cafe close by and wanted to stop for dinner. They open at 9pm and.... Fusion of Spanish, Asian, Middle Eastern and Latin American influences - this is a gastronomical experience that blew our minds away. We tried the croqueta.... As Americans in Madrid who are not interested in tourist fare we wanted to get away from Gran Via. We read good reviews about La Gastro and gave it a shot.....

name: Hard Rock Cafe
address: Paseo de la Castellana, 2, 28046 Madrid, Spain
review: Best meal in town! As an American traveling in Spain for three weeks, the hard rock was a sight for sore eyes. Tired of eating tapas, cheese and bread, I.... Food was cooked perfectly. I got a bbq burger which came with French fries that I didn't end up eating. For drinks  my buddies got beer I got a mango tango.... Well I know its a tourist thing but what the heck!?  Dropped in on a Saturday afternoon and the place was crazy!  Not all tourists either. The folks I sat....

name: Goiko Grill
address: Calle de María de Molina, 20, 28006 Madrid, Spain
review:
There is no other word than AMAZING !!!! Best burgers i ever had and believe me, i ate a lot of burgers in my life !
I tried almost the whole menu by now.... After three weeks in Europe (and lots of our own cooking,) we were jonesing for a premium burger. Lots of local and chain options where we're staying in the.... Well finally took the time to try out the famous hamburgues in Goiko grill. This franchise is all over Spain, and now I was gonna taste a burguer from them....

name: La Maruca
review:
As vegetarians, our meal was amazing. 

The highlights:
- The mushroom tortilla 
- The cheese and tomato salad
- The cheese and honey flan

Simple.... Wow. Amazing. Easily the best meal I had in Madrid. Almost lost a star for the server who took our drink order and brought water. Not sure what the attitude.... We came here on a friends recommendation and I am glad we did.  This was without a doubt my favorite meal in Madrid. It is located in a pretty upscale....

name: Celso y Manolo
address: Calle de la Libertad, 1, 28004 Madrid, Spain
review: Oh my goodness this place was adorable. We ate here our first night in Madrid. The service was fabulous and the food was amazing!!! We are still talking.... Ate here Aug 2022 and thought it was good but definitely more on the pricey side than other restaurants we went in Madrid. Since it's such highly rated on.... With such great yelp reviews we wanted to check out this restaurant on our last night in Madrid! We were lucky to get a reservation. This restaurant is very....

name: O'Caldiño
review:
This is a high end Spanish seafood restaurant. You will walk away knowing that you have eaten well both via your stomach and your wallet. 

The food is.... Located on a quieter street, this was a great find on a Saturday night.  We took our waiter Adrian's suggestion and ordered the steamed clams. They were.... Overpriced and mediocre.  Waiter suggested peppers and cheese.  26 euros for food I could make at home.  Fish was with a heavy lemon cream sauce...not food.....

name: Food Truck
review:
Un gran descubrimiento.
Los cheese ticks estaban riquísimos y la burger de costillas una pasada.
Un sitio altamente recomendable..

name: Casa Lucas
address: Calle de la Cava Baja, 30, 28005 Madrid, Spain
review:
Great little tapas wine bar on Calle cava baja. Awesome food and great attentive services. We arrived shortly after 8:30pm and was seated right away. Within.... Very good tapas. Intimate setting, casual, family like, good service. Three tapas shared between two people, €31. We had a lovely time at Casa Lucas on a Sunday night.  Bartender Javier was a terrific guide. 

We started with vermú-- lovely vermouth on ice with a bit of....

name: Tinto y Tapas
review:
Reseña en ingles y español. 

Tinto y tapas was the perfect place to stop in for a mid-day snack (or lunch) after touring the museums all morning. We.... Adorable. A bit of unique menu with specials. Wine fabulous. Service friendly.  Food amazing.. Excellent lunch stop!  We each ordered an open face sandwich (I had the chicken, husband had the ham) and split a salad. It was the perfect portion and the....

name: TriCiclo
review:
Classic tasting menu was fantastic. Each dish had lots of flavor. As someone who is not a very adventurous eater and often feels like tasting menus are too.... Madrid is known for exceptional food and this spot - a Michellin Bib Gourmand was beyond expectation! This is an exceptional restaurant with atmosphere,.... Everything is great especially service.
We went in early at their opening hour without reservations. The restaurant filled up quickly, but it was a great....

name: Swagat
address: Calle de Nuñez de Balboa, 29, 28001 Madrid, Spain
review:
Returning to this restaurant from about two Years ago, this place reminded me of the warmth and delicacy I tasted last time. Given that I was in town for a.... Don't miss this place if you love Indian food. From menu of the day lunch special, the service is very friendly and inviting and the kitchen puts a little.... This was one of the best indian food that I had in Spain across outside of Barcelona. 

We tried 2 dishes, Baigan Achari and Paneer Haryali. Both were good....

name: Lakasa
address: Plaza del Descubridor Diego de Ordás, 1, 28003 Madrid, Spain
review:
Traveling in Madrid alone, I wanted to treat myself to a good authentic Spanish meal and this place seemed to fit the bill. After doing some research, I.... Yes, it is that good. 

Yes, you should definitely make reservations. 

Yes, you should get the mussels. 

Yes, please save room for desserts. 

Cannot wait.... It is my fifth time to be here. It is hard to believe I live on the other side of the world! This is definitely the restaurant you never want to miss! The....

name: El Barril
review: One word. SQUID. Actually...not squid, CUTTLEFISH. (Bc they are different now that I looked it up on google.) Get the grilled cuttlefish with garlic salt..... We loved this place in the quiet of August.  The grilled squid was tender and so tasty and we've had alot of squid. The garlic monkfish was also delicious.... Ecellent place for seafood. They open for late lunch on Sunday which is great when your traveling. Food is top notch. The ham (jabugo) in this seafood place....

name: Sala de Despiece
review:
An amazing meal!

It's an omakase style dinner, pre fixe, with the ability to add on sides, but with the amount of food, there is no need for adding.... Amazing, unlike anything. Smart concept, I've ever experienced before. 
Make reservations and come open minded to try things, you typically don't like. 
And.... Ok so this review is technically for the SDD2 location, but they are not on Yelp so I will add it here!

Made a reservation a few weeks prior and came for....

name: Tatel
address: Paseo de la Castellana, 36, 28046 Madrid, Spain
review: Wonderful ambience, music and staff. The food did not disappoint. We had the special roasted artichokes, Iberian flank steak and the truffle risotto.  I.... Colleagues and I came to get dinner at Tatel on Sunday night. There was a female live singer with a silky amazing voice that was definitely the highlight of.... One of the fancier places in Madrid for a nice meal. We had to make reservations since it looked like it was fully booked a lot of nights. On the phone they....

name: Estay
review: This is the best place to have authentic Spanish food in Madrid! I wanted to experience traditional Spanish food and was not disappointed. My friends and I.... Best place in Madrid when it comes to tapas! Worth ordering the steak tartare, "delicias de algas", or any other main dish from their menu! It's located in.... A family friend brought us here for late night tapas.  She speaks perfect Spanish, so she was able to convey my vegan-ness to the waiter.  There's nothing....

name: El Pimiento Verde
review:
Impressed by this place! Since we got there, and please make reservations, we were well taken care of.
I want a special thanks to Manuel the  "manager" that.... Food was excellent.  The artichokes and white asparagus appetizers were absolutely divine and the lobster risotto was well done too though I could have done.... The homemade croquettes was delicious 
The grilled octopus was perfect and soft 
The bread and ceviche was delicious 
The receptionist and the waiter was....

name: Casa Benigna
review: Casa Benigna and its staff were absolutely wonderful! It was recommended to me by a Madrileño friend as having the best rice, and that was totally accurate..... EAT HERE IMMEDIATELY! I cannot recommend this quaint restaurant enough!The staff is amazing, caring and genuine. Impeccable service. They treat you like.... Great food and outstanding service-good interiors My husband and i came for pre birthday dinner and not only enjoyed the food but the owners were so....

name: Cacao Restobar
review:
Awesome.  The best sangria I've ever had.  

Octopus was amazing, and the staff was super friendly.. Everything was delicious.  The vegetarian corn arepas was amazing!!  Highly recommend!!!. Not that bad, but all's too sweet or too salty which comes as a surprise given the place's rating.

name: La Castela
address: Calle del Dr. Castelo, 22, 28009 Madrid, Spain
review:
First dinner in Madrid.

Looks small from the street entrance but there are dining tables in the rear of the bar.

We walked in at 10pm (prime dinner time).... Definitely the best tapas restaurant we visited this week.  Service was great with very friendly staff happy to help us with menu.  Food was really good..... Excellent old  Madrid classic. Well known and loved by Madrid connoisseurs; and a celebrities spot since Michell Obama dinned here. The food is consistently....

name: Cardamomo Tablao Flamenco
review:
Wonderful show in a great ambiance.

I was able to easily book my ticket online just a few hours prior to the show. I booked category A (closest to the.... Great experience.  I'd recommend them.

For a quick, one hour taste of Flamenco, this is a good Madrid choice.  They get you in and out efficiently. 

I got.... I'll be honest: I didn't know what Flamenco was before I saw this show. I knew it was a Spanish tradition. I figured that "flamenco" probably derives from....

name: La Malontina
review: La Malontina is a very small restaurant. There may be 6 tables total.  That said, we came without a reservation and were able to be seated for lunch with.... An amazing experience! A very quaint restaurant, probably can seat about 30 people, but quite lovely. The service was great, very kind, informative, and not.... A simply fantastic, intimate dining experience where pride is taken in the preparation of the food.  My son and I were alone and we simply handed the....

name: Botín
review:
Historical restaurant that we felt honored to have dined here, in aug 2022.

The service was great. The friendly cute waiter even took a photo with.... MADRID - 05/07/23 - What makes Botin so special other than it's listed as the oldest restaurant in the world by the Guinness Book of World Records.  Botin.... We were here 4/20/23 with a reservation and were seated immediately. It was a little hot that day, so my fiancé wore a sleeveless tank. Ooops! Thankfully,....

name: Lateral
review:
This is a great spot to grab dinner or tapas. From the pinchos to the actual entrees, it's all good. Also, the menu is very diverse. It's so diverse that.... Super cute, good service and cool outdoor seating. We ordered a few different plates to share and they were all really really great. Favorite by far was the.... Very good adresse in Madrid!
Lots of choices you can share.
Prices are affordable approximately 20€ per person without alcohol 
Loved the burata, the....

name: El Gran Barril
review:
For seafood lovers, El Gran Barril is a place to schedule in your foodie agenda while in Madrid.  

Located near the Goya station, it is easy to get to..... Food was great. It's a block away from our hotel . Service was good. Our waiter was attentive but had a little trouble understanding us, so we got shrimp.... All the dishes were prepared very well.
Contemporary and blight ambiance and well trained staff, very professional and helpful! 
Plus quality wine listings.....

name: La Cabaña Argentina
address: Calle de Ventura de la Vega, 10, 28014 Madrid, Spain
review: What a great surprise to find this restaurant it will be worth the trip down this small road.  Artichokes we're out of this world and the ribeye steak and.... Place was insanely good. Only problem is I was to full or order seconds. Highly recommend for amazing food . Everything tasted beyond good. Ambiance was.... Spectacular food. My wife had the octopus and I had the steak with pepper sauce. We followed that up with a bottle of wine and an amazing flambé crepe with....

name: Bar Tomate
address: Calle Fernando el Santo, 26, 28010 Madrid, Spain
review:
Great environment, it's quiet enough for work or chat but also good for party. 
The menu is easy to choose and good for all kinds of choice. Very.... Nice place, seems very popular with young women. Basically a pizza place... took me a while to figure it out the menu. Duck tacos are ok, but need spicy.... Love this place, had the black pumpkin pizza as my main, also ordered the eggplant starter. The tomato juice in this place is great and i truly recommend....

name: Pizzaiolo
review:
This might be our family's favorite restaurant in Madrid. Yes, the pizza, food, and dessert are wonderful; however, what makes it just a touch above, is the.... This is by far the best pizza I have had, amazing!! My girlfriend also had pasta and it was just really good. Would 100% recommend.. Best pizza I've ever had! 

This place was such a gem; wanted to go to pizzateca due to the reviews on Yelp originally but it was closed so we came here and....

name: Punto MX
address: Calle del General Pardiñas, 40, 28001 Madrid, Spain
review:
We had a really unique experience, no menu per se, but a chef flown in from a small town in Mexico was in residence for a week or so and had a full menu.... Very disappointing food and service. It took more than 15 minutes to bring our drink order and we had to remind them to bring it.

Ordering the food was.... Good food but simple taco at ten times normal price is outlandish.  Margarita for 13 euros total ripoff. Get slightly better pricing and I am happy to return.

name: Angelita
address: Calle de la Reina, 4, 28004 Madrid, Spain
review:
Really nice cozy place in the heart of Madrid !!

Great server!. We are huge winos, so my wife surprised me with this experience. In America this bill would of easily been $120-150 here with tip we spent $60. Im legit.... Having been living in Madrid for about a month now I can easily say that Angelita has been in my top two if not, my favorite dining experience. We made....

name: Flavia
address: Calle Gil de Santivañes, 2, 28001 Madrid, Spain
review:
Ooooh Flavia was beyond perfect!
I had the truffle butter pasta with prawns and omg it was to die for! My cousin had the lasagna and said that also was.... I went to this restaurant due to the high reviews in yelp. This is one of the very few times where I got bad food from a great yelp score (also high in trip.... Excellent ambiance and atmosphere. We ordered two pasta dishes and both were very good. Service could improve though..

name: Tierra del Queiles
review: Artichokes, risotto, and oxtail  will feed two very nicely from portion size. Locals sit on 2nd floor where air condition is better, but be prepared to used.... Don't know who our server was as she didn't say her name. She couldn't speak very good English, but I managed to convey to her what we wanted. We had some.... Food was fine, but a little pricey. Might have been a language barrier with my poor Spanish but we had to ask for some items a couple of times, and there....

name: Bendita Locura
address: Calle del Príncipe de Vergara, 73, 28006 Madrid, Spain
review:
Looks good but my advice- get reservations.
It was packed so likely it's good but we didn't have reservations so we left- making a reservation for tomorrow.... During a recent visit to Madrid my family and I dined discovered this gem across the street from our hotel. We dined at Bendita Locura on a couple of days..... Brunch is served from 10:00 am. That is the best option. Good eggs Benedictine. And service was very good.

name: Casa Lucio
address: Calle de la Cava Baja, 35, 28005 Madrid, Spain
review:
Casa Lucio es un lugar encantador. Menú lleno de platos tradicionales y es todo una institución en Madrid. For a good meal in a nostalgic atmosphere, you'll want to check out Casa Lucio. It came recommended by a local, so we headed over. We did not make.... Casa Lucio has an elegant dining space on Calle de la Cava Baja.

Huevos Rotos is a simple dish with French fries, sunny side fried eggs, and salchichón....

name: Metro Bistro
review:
I highly recommend metro bistro because of their €39.5 7 course tasting menu. We started off with this incredible pumpkin soup with a strong cheese..... Siriloin steak too salty 
Too salty 
Potatoes gratin not good .
Very mediocre food 
Very disappointed. One of the best meals of my 8 day trip to Spain & Portugal! My friend met me in Madrid for the first night and we ended up at Metro Bistro after I found....

name: Álbora
address: Calle de Jorge Juan, 33, 28001 Madrid, Spain
review: Really great place to have dinner. The service is great. Their amuse bouche are super delicious. The potato pockets served with entrees are also great.. Has the short tasting menu with wine pairings for lunch. Great service and interesting food. Some we're definitely tastier than others. Overall a good.... #Michelin #onestar #Madrid #Spain We had a dinner here. Clean and romantic bar and atmosphere. Not bad service. Well the food was just okay. Especially....

name: La Musa
address: Calle de Manuela Malasaña, 18, 28004 Madrid, Spain
review: Had a great lunch amongst the 4 of us, w fresh salads, fried Green tomatoes, langosti ba, venison, and duck gyozas. our waiter Luis was great! highly.... My partner and I stopped by La Musa for some lunch while visiting Madrid. The food was absolutely amazing, the staff were great, the atmosphere was lively.... Fun night out in Madrid. Small restaurant with very friendly helpful waitstaff. Ordered the tasting menu which is a good mix of the tapas. Would recommend....

name: Bacira
review:
An affordable Michelin-starred restaurant in Madrid! 

Bacira, like many Spanish restaurants, has a menú del día for weekday lunches, and this one is easily.... Alert alert, this is a legitimate destination restaurant if you're in Madrid. I honestly can't remember the last meal I had at this price point -- $115 US.... MUST HAVE THE FRESH TUNA AND ALSO THE RISOTTO!!!

Everything we ate here was top notch. The flavors were all unlike anything I've ever ate. The atmosphere....

name: El Sur
address: Calle de la Torrecilla del Leal, 12, 28012 Madrid, Spain
review: This was the first and last restaurant I went to in Madrid because I couldn't leave without coming back for another meal! I got the seafood paella (paella.... A place that as well loved by locals. Reminds me a lot of the local places in Madrid, where you will be able to sit at the bar and have a drink, and even.... El Sur was our first stop in Madrid. The staff was extremely friendly and knew we were visiting from Miami. We chatted up a storm since the server had been....

name: Cazorla
review: I just went to this restaurant and the service was really good. It's a perfect restaurant for typical Spanish food, specially for someone visiting. We order.... My fave neighborhood bar--I love it. The staff was immediately warm and friendly when I moved in, they were patient with my Spanish, and made me feel at.... Excellent tapas place, tight space, great food and very friendly service! The owner is very helpful and knowledgeable..

name: Marina Ventura
address: Calle Ventura de la Vega, 13, 28014 Madrid, Spain
review:
We chose to come here over another place since they offer a varied menu than just paella.  So glad we did!

We all agreed the seafood paella here was the.... Amazing food, great atmosphere, and wonderful staff! We had the seafood paella which was delicious! Grab their pitcher of sangria and enjoy and relax..... Serving some of the best paella in Madrid, and certainly the best fried squid in all of Spain, Marina Ventura is a narrow restaurant tucked into one of many....
